primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: God initiates communication with a rebellious and indifferent humanity through a chosen messenger to reconstitute their identity and future.

tekstueel_bewijs: I will take you from the nations
I will sprinkle clean water upon you
I, the Lord, have spoken, and I will do it.

object.identificatie: The Restoration of the People (A new heart and spirit)
tekstueel_bewijs: A new heart I will give you
reconstituting them as they are supposed to be
He acts according to who he is in himself.

ontvanger.identificatie: The Exiles / The Hearers (New York City 'sophisticates' and believers)
tekstueel_bewijs: And you shall be my people, and I will be your God.
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer is positioned as the Receiver of a promise, not the Subject of the action.

helper.identificatie: The Prophet / The Word / The Spirit
tekstueel_bewijs: I will put my spirit within you
helper.rol_van_god: God is the Subject who provides the Helper (Spirit/Word).
helper.rol_van_geest: Indwelling power that causes the Subject's statutes to be walked in.

tegenstander.identificatie: Secular Superiority / Rebelliousness / The 'Heart of Stone'
tekstueel_bewijs: mask for their feelings of superiority
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is not just bad habits but an ontological 'heart of stone' and a spiritual rebellion that only God can remove.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The believer bearing witness in a secular environment.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Hearer (Christian people)
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The witness is a 'primary determination' that follows being addressed and reconstituted by the Word.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: God's Faithfulness → New Heart/Presence → Rebellious Humanity
actantieel_schema_visualisatie.helper_subject_tegenstander: The Spirit/Word → God ← Secular Pride/Heart of Stone

voorbeelden_god_subject: I will take out of your flesh the heart of stone.
voorbeelden_mens_subject: You come here... to be strengthened.
Many of you talk to us... about your struggles.

voorbeelden: be careful to observe my ordinances
we want to be sure that they are refusing to hear the real thing
we wouldn’t have a clue about the God who is really God if God hadn’t spoken
God is powerful and able to make his promises come to pass
The Word of God is performative

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon focuses on God's 'ability' (Pouvoir) to act where humans are 'unable' (the heart of stone).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the 'Evolutionary Ladder' (Niet-S2) through the reality of 'Rebellion' (S2) to the 'Performative Word' (S1).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: God breaks the tension by sovereignly replacing S2 with S1 (Heart of Flesh).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: High; the 'rebellious house' and 'scorpions' are presented as formidable barriers.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: The sermon is profoundly theocentric. God is the primary actor; the human condition is described as a state of 'exile' and 'impotence' that only a performative Word can resolve.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: That is your work too... bearing witness.

indicatoren_genade.indicator: God as Subject of Active Verbs
indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: I will sprinkle... I will cleanse... I will give.
The Word of God is performative—it is actively at work making itself happen.

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Ezekiel is not presented as a hero to imitate, but as a 'mortal' who is himself a recipient of the Word and the scroll.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Ezekiel is a 'helper' actant for God's primary program.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Relief and comfort; the burden of 'doing' is replaced by the promise of God's 'doing'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Monergistic sanctification (God causes the walking in statutes).

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The sermon maintains a strict hierarchy: God speaks/acts first, human response is a secondary determination.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: I will put my spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is the endowment of 'Pouvoir-faire' (ability) to the heart of stone.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Severe; described as a 'heart of stone' that cannot be educated or evolved out of.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The narrative engine is powered by God's speech. The hearer is correctly positioned as the object of God's transformative action.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: Maintain as is; this is a necessary correction for a 'secular' audience.

tegenstander_intensivering.huidige_status: The 'Evolutionary Ladder' is a sophisticated modern Opponent.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: Soteriology (God cleanses) → Ethics (Cause you to walk).

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: This sermon is a masterclass in theocentric narrative. It successfully avoids the 'Evolutionary Ladder' of moralism by making God the sole Subject of the transformation.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, it uses personal anecdotes; semiotically, these anecdotes serve to define the 'Opponent' (Secular Pride).
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: It moves beyond the meaning of Ezekiel's time to the functional role of the 'Word' in the hearer's present.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that despite the 'I' of the preacher, the 'Subject' of the deep structure remains God throughout.

appendices.notities: The sermon explicitly uses Barthian categories to reinforce the 'God as Subject' structure.
